segments.text: I see the boy reaching for the cookie jar, and I feel a pang of sadness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so focused on the cookies that he doesn’t realize how close he is to falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, and it makes me feel sorry for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to get hurt, and it makes me feel helpless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the counter, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is a scene from a sad movie, where everything is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to take a tumble, and the girl is just going to stand there and watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel sorry for all of them, even though they don’t realize it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is a mess, and it’s just going to get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
